title: Boldchat Operator Client 4.70
description:
Free live chat software for online sales and support teams.
Increase sales, improve customer service, and reduce support
costs. Simply install the client and add a chat button to your
website to start chatting with your visitors. Upgrade to a paid
edition to also manage sales leads, manage inbound emails,
manage help desk tickets, and initiate pro-active chats with
visitors. Used by over 11,000 active websites. Version 4.70
added Automatic Chat Invitations, Pre- & Post-Chat Surveys, and
improved Email Attachment support.
